Name: Sosso
About the game: This is a slightly cute but brain burning platform jumping puzzle solving game, which requires you to carefully observe, find the right route, get the key and open the door to the next level. After the hero is brought to the wonderful cave by the vortex of time and space, you will lead him to escape from this place. Simple painting style The simple and lovely painting style, combined with the brisk puzzle solving rhythm Various levels and mechanisms Different mechanisms match different levels to produce magical chemical reactions. Try to escape with the protagonist! -It supports some handle controls, and it is recommended to use the handle to experience -Keyboard WSAD moves, J jumps -Ingenious movement between terrains
